p: The HIV clinical outcomes assessed in this analysis were retention in care and viral suppression. Retention in HIV medical care was defined as PLWH who had at least 2 outpatient ambulatory health service (OAHS) visit dates that were at least 90 days apart in 2017, with the first visit occurring before September 1. Viral suppression was defined as the most recent reported HIV RNA test result of <200 copies/mL.
